website_summaries.verdict: For well under the cost of several similarly rated document scanners, the Xerox DocuMate 6440 scans more than fast enough for the price and it's highly accurate.
pros: High daily duty cycle for price
Includes PDF creation and editing and document management software
cons: Lag time between scanning and saving to searchable PDF is significant

customer_reviews.title: It works.  Limited competition in this price and size category
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a off brand Korean made off brand tabloid scanner used predominately for black and white drawing scans that are often up to 11"x17" size. The 4700 was about the only brand I found in my price range, that was capable of 600 dpi scans. The software it comes is miserable, hence the 3 star review, but once I got past that and just worked with the scanner it seems to function okay. I just wish I could get it to work better with my combination of Windows 10 and Photoshop CS6 but it does get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy in Maine

customer_reviews.title: 11" x 17" Scans at Home
customer_reviews.text: Now I don't have to go to the copy store to scan my 11"x 17" drawings!
customer_reviews.author: Nightwind_4

customer_reviews.title: Not for newbies
customer_reviews.text: The driver setup took a lot of finagling. I wouldn't recommend this someone who's used to plug-and-play. And I still cannot find a manual that describes what the different scanner settings do. It's not in the online documentation. That said, it's a good, fast scanner. If you're scanning a lot, you'll need Adobe Acrobat DC too, because sometimes it randomly turns images upside down and on their sides. It's easy enough to fix in Acrobat. Create the file from the separate images, then edit using Organize Pages. If you need something for casual scanning, buy something easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: RedPooka

customer_reviews.title: Two items in a row defective
customer_reviews.text: Returned two different items for the same problem - arrived with light bar detached from its rail. I don't think this model can survive shipping. Boxes in both instances were undamaged. Seems like it just has weak components that can't handle getting tossed around during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Pro’s and Cons
customer_reviews.text: This product has a nice large platform, scans quickly in one movement, unlike my others which take several runs for one page. Downside is that it does not work with my Mac. It does work with Windows 10
customer_reviews.author: Christi kellas

customer_reviews.title: Software issues
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to simply scan a photograph into a JPG file but I could not find that option in the software! You could scan to an email, or scan to an editing program, or scan to a PDF converter, but I could not figure out how to just save to a regular image file without going through another program. This scanner would probably be great for digitizing documents, but I found the software too complicated for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hershenson

product_meta.title: Xerox DocuMate 4700 Color Document Flatbed Scanner
product_meta.description: Scan legal and tabloid-sized documents quickly and easily with the Xerox DocuMate 4700 Color Document Flatbed Scanner. This flatbed scanner scans large format documents and artwork up to 11.7 by 17 inches at a rate of 2.5 seconds per page. With Visioneer OneTouch with Acuity, you can scan documents using your preferred settings, instantly improve image quality, and save them to virtually any application, folder, or device--all with the touch of a button. Great for archiving and production tasks, this flatbed scanner is compatible with PCs using included drivers. The DocuMate 4700 is backed by a three-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Flatbed scanner ideal for legal size and large format documents and artwork
Maximum paper size: 11.7 by 17 inches; minimum size 0.15 by 0.15 inches
Scans at a rate of 2.5 seconds/page at 300 dpi
Can be connected to Xerox DocuMate ADF scanners
Flatbed scanner measures 22.8 by 19.5 by 4.5 inches
